nodes.excerpt: When you read an email you will see a numerical score just below the subject–a score between 0 and 100. A score of 100 means the email is very easy to read and a score of 0 means the email is very difficult to read.
nodes.title: Gmail inbox Readability Score - Calculating the readability score of an email
nodes.author: Argyrou Argyris

localize.description: 当你阅读一封电子邮件时，你会在主题下方看到一个数字分数-一个介于0到100之间的分数。分数100表示电子邮件非常容易阅读，分数0表示电子邮件很难阅读。
localize.tagline: 计算电子邮件的可读性分数

localize.description: 當你閱讀一封電子郵件時，你會在主題下方看到一個數字分數-一個介於0到100之間的分數。分數100表示電子郵件非常容易閱讀，分數0表示電子郵件很難閱讀。
localize.tagline: 計算電子郵件的可讀性分數

nodes.excerpt: Influencers, Superpage gives a new way to fund your passion by responding to fan messages. By setting up your unique contact page, you can now let anyone send a message by paying what they want.

nodes.excerpt: Findnlink is a platform where you can share your projects and find co-founders/members. - Customize your project page - Create your own portfolio / profile - Show your skills We want to make Findnlink a great virtual workspace to connect teams together 👌

nodes.excerpt: Invoicer is a document based invoice maker app available exclusively on iOS/iPadOS/macOS platforms. All your invoice files and preferences are stored in iCloud so you can work seemlessly across different devices without the need to create an account for syncing.
nodes.title: Invoicer - Document based invoice maker app for iOS/iPadOS/macOS
nodes.author: Alex

localize.description: Invoice是一个基于文档的发票制作应用程序，仅在iOS/iPadOS/MacOS平台上可用。您的所有发票文件和首选项都存储在iCloud中，因此您可以跨不同设备无缝工作，而无需创建用于同步的帐户。
localize.tagline: 适用于iOS/iPadOS/MacOS的基于文档的发票生成器应用程序

localize.description: Invoice是一個基於文檔的發票製作應用程序，僅在iOS/iPadOS/MacOS平臺上可用。您的所有發票文件和首選項都存儲在iCloud中，因此您可以跨不同設備無縫工作，而無需創建用於同步的帳戶。
localize.tagline: 適用於iOS/iPadOS/MacOS的基於文檔的發票生成器應用程序

nodes.excerpt: Being productive is hard. Success is based on prioritized task lists and the Pomodoro Technique. Plan your week, set your daily tasks, and reflect on the past days to reach all your goals.
nodes.title: Success Planner - Minimalist iOS/Android app to track daily tasks
nodes.author: Arnaud

localize.description: 保持高效率是很难的。成功是基于按优先顺序排列的任务列表和波莫多罗(Pomodoro)技术。计划你的一周，设定你的每日任务，反思过去几天以达到你所有的目标。
localize.tagline: 极简主义的iOS/Android应用程序可跟踪日常任务

localize.description: 保持高效率是很難的。成功是基於按優先順序排列的任務列表和波莫多羅(Pomodoro)技術。計劃你的一週，設定你的每日任務，反思過去幾天以達到你所有的目標。
localize.tagline: 極簡主義的iOS/Android應用程序可跟蹤日常任務

nodes.excerpt: Blending Psychology and Artificial Intelligence with layers of insights from 10,000+ books and articles, Odo is your empathetic AI companion that chats, reads, thinks, and offers a helpful conversation to help you grow. Only available in India.

localize.description: 将心理学和人工智能与来自10,000多本书和文章的多层洞察力融为一体，Odo是您富有同理心的AI同伴，它聊天、阅读、思考，并提供有用的对话来帮助您成长。只在印度有售。

nodes.excerpt: Sponsorware for Github is the easiest way to sell access to your private repositories on Github with Github Sponsors. Get started in minutes and start selling your software on Github today!

nodes.excerpt: Confetti is a colorful habit tracker that tracks your daily/weekly habits & to-dos and launches confetti for every completion to celebrate your daily accomplishments. Confetti also makes it easy to visualize your progress over time with in-depth stats.
nodes.title: Confetti iOS + Android - Develop good habits and eliminate bad ones
nodes.author: Danny Sapio

localize.description: 五彩纸屑是一个五颜六色的习惯跟踪器，它跟踪你每天/每周的习惯和待办事项，并在每次完成时推出五彩纸屑来庆祝你的日常成就。五彩纸屑还可以很容易地通过深入的统计数据直观地显示您随着时间的推移的进展情况。
localize.tagline: 养成好习惯，改掉坏习惯

localize.description: 五彩紙屑是一個五顏六色的習慣跟蹤器，它跟蹤你每天/每週的習慣和待辦事項，並在每次完成時推出五彩紙屑來慶祝你的日常成就。五彩紙屑還可以很容易地通過深入的統計數據直觀地顯示您隨着時間的推移的進展情況。
localize.tagline: 養成好習慣，改掉壞習慣

nodes.excerpt: 1 Second Everyday is a video diary that makes it easy to take your day-to-day moments and create a meaningful movie of your life. It’s a home for all your notable memories, not just the Insta-worthy. Get started with 1SE today!

localize.description: 1秒每一天是一个视频日记，可以轻松地拍摄你的日常时刻，并为你的生活创造一部有意义的电影。它是你所有值得注意的记忆的家，而不仅仅是值得在Insta上使用的。今天就开始使用1SE吧！

nodes.excerpt: Daily-curated Remote Jobs for Everyone Features: - simple list (Hacker News style) - simple & fast search powered by Algolia - only the latest jobs from the last 30 days - no long descriptions, just simple titles and links - no ads - simple email newsletter
nodes.title: Remotelane 3.0 - Remote jobs for everyone with the most simple ux and search
nodes.author: ronatory

localize.description: 每日-为每个人策划的远程工作功能：-简单列表(黑客新闻风格)-由Algolia提供支持的简单快速搜索-仅限过去30天的最新工作-没有详细描述，只有简单的标题和链接-没有广告-简单的电子邮件时事通讯
localize.tagline: 通过最简单的用户体验和搜索，为每个人提供远程作业

nodes.excerpt: Elza browser is not a replacement for your web browser but a powerful tool when you would like to keep your browsing private. Elza is always on incognito with an option to turn on Tor which runs much faster than even the Tor Browser. #Minimal #Fast #Private
nodes.title: Elza Browser - Fast, private, and minimal web browser.
nodes.author: Nitin Sudhakar

localize.description: ELZA浏览器不是您的Web浏览器的替代品，而是当您想要保持您的浏览隐私时的一个功能强大的工具。Elza总是隐姓埋名，可以选择打开Tor，它的运行速度甚至比Tor浏览器都快得多。#最小值 #快速 #私有
localize.tagline: 快速、私密且最小的Web浏览器。

localize.description: ELZA瀏覽器不是您的Web瀏覽器的替代品，而是當您想要保持您的瀏覽隱私時的一個功能強大的工具。Elza總是隱姓埋名，可以選擇打開Tor，它的運行速度甚至比Tor瀏覽器都快得多。#最小值 #快速 #私有
localize.tagline: 快速、私密且最小的Web瀏覽器。

nodes.excerpt: For anyone wanting to improve their wellness and achieve their goals, the HistoricalMe app is your private, online space that makes it simple to record and track all elements of your daily life. Find out more about you with this diary app in 2021.

nodes.title: Niceboard 2.0 - Start a job board. No code required.
nodes.author: Olivier

localize.description: Niceboard是开始你自己的利基职位板业务的最简单的方式，而不需要编写一行代码。在几分钟内设置您的主板，连接您自己的域，查看实时应用程序统计信息，回填作业，翻译它，使用私有API等等！
localize.tagline: 创建一个求职公告板。不需要代码。

localize.description: Niceboard是開始你自己的利基職位板業務的最簡單的方式，而不需要編寫一行代碼。在幾分鐘內設置您的主板，連接您自己的域，查看實時應用程序統計信息，回填作業，翻譯它，使用私有API等等！
localize.tagline: 創建一個求職公告板。不需要代碼。

nodes.excerpt: How colorful was your Instagram in 2020? Get an interactive report about the most prominent colors you've shared in your posts throughout the year. Discover your personal or brand palette or reconnect with your most colourful experiences. Now on iOS & Android.
nodes.title: Year of Colour 2020 - Find out which colours you most used on Instagram this year
nodes.author: Stef Lewandowski

localize.description: 2020年，你的Instagram有多丰富多彩？获取一份关于你全年在帖子中分享的最突出颜色的互动报告。发现您的个人或品牌调色板，或重新连接您最丰富多彩的体验。现在用的是iOS和Android。
localize.tagline: 找出你今年在Instagram上最常用的颜色

localize.description: 2020年，你的Instagram有多豐富多彩？獲取一份關於你全年在帖子中分享的最突出顏色的互動報告。發現您的個人或品牌調色板，或重新連接您最豐富多彩的體驗。現在用的是iOS和Android。
localize.tagline: 找出你今年在Instagram上最常用的顏色

nodes.excerpt: Record Screen or Webcam and Share instantly. No need to install any application. Just super fast recording and share. Live Streaming Feature to be added very soon. Super fast recordings to give feedback to your team, education, creating product demos.
nodes.title: Record Webcam + Screen > Share - Simple Screen + Webcam Recording. Share after recording
nodes.author: Hammad Akbar

localize.description: 录制屏幕或网络摄像头，并立即共享。无需安装任何应用程序。只是超快的录制和分享。即将添加直播功能。超快录制，为您的团队、培训、创建产品演示提供反馈。
localize.tagline: 简单的屏幕+网络摄像头录制。录制后共享

localize.description: 錄製屏幕或網絡攝像頭，並立即共享。無需安裝任何應用程序。只是超快的錄製和分享。即將添加直播功能。超快錄製，爲您的團隊、培訓、創建產品演示提供反饋。
localize.tagline: 簡單的屏幕+網絡攝像頭錄製。錄製後共享
